title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Climate Change Data Visualization and Collaborative Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational understanding of scientific phenomena
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three types of data visualizations (charts, infographics, etc.) using publicly available climate change data
Learners can explain the process of hypothesis formulation and verification by utilizing two or more variables during data interpretation
Learners can produce storytelling content based on scientific evidence by connecting climate change data with personal experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
